title: If you could pick one K-pop song to describe your life, what would it be, and why? - Quora

response.answer_text: I would probably choose I Need U. Exept the part where apparently they need there girlfriend. All my lide almost everybody I meet is nice with me at first but then mean. I forgive them but I know that I am going to get hurt again. I hated this sooooo much that I got depression. And everyday I would say to my self “ nobody in this world is EVER truly love tou and be with you”. I got cyberbullied by my own close friends. They betrayed me. They talked sh*t about me and they even said “ eluney should go to hell for being such a bit*ch” And then my aunt got cancer. My dad got me in trouble for no reason which stressed me out so bad because I guess I am the type of girl that hates to be threatened for no reason. But then again I know I am going to get hurt by the same people if I try to go back to them. The same people do not know how I feel inside. So this is a little bit about my life but I have a story that will go on way more and most of that causes my to almost kill myself.
Gee, there are a lot, but I think at this point in my life it would be Spring Day by BTS. I am struggling a bit with missing a guy that I like a whole lot, and won’t see for the next year.
